description: This file sets up an AI agent using the agno framework, configured to generate audio via the ElevenLabs API. It imports necessary modules, creates an agent with specific tools and instructions, and demonstrates usage by printing responses for audio generation requests.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent configured with a model, tools, and behavior settings.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Model class for interacting with OpenAI's chat models.

classes.name: ElevenLabsTools
classes.description: Tool class for interfacing with the ElevenLabs API for audio generation.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method to output the agent's response to a prompt.
